title: Special options
description: Defines special filter options which are used for creating the dataset. Options are applied before passing to subsets, so overwriting them might not take effect.

convert2And4ToWords.description: If true, then the numbers 2 and 4 are converted to the words 'to' and 'for' if they are used in the middle of a method name. ([a-zA-Z_][24][a-zA-Z_]) This is also true for all subsets, so subsets cannot disable this setting.

minMethodNameLength.description: Sets the minimum length of a method to pass the filter. As only methods with this length pass the filter (and therefore are passed to subsets), subsets can only narrow this setting further.

typeClasses.description: Path to a file containing type class definitions used for this dataset (and it's subsets). If empty, no type classes will be used.
